name: Beyond The Bow
description:
Minnie Thymes is a time-traveller who gets stuck on the Titanic, just hours before it sinks. Can Minnie stop the ship from sinking and save everyone on board?

A game by Claire Reid, Kiera Boyle, and Mark Kershaw.

Soundtrack:

https://soundcloud.com/user-183718275/sets/beyond-the-bow-soundtrack

*NOTE  - in-browser game might give an .html error. If this happens, the best way to play is to download the game.
